plot: An Afghan-American physician returns to war-torn southern Afghanistan to build a school and bring real educational opportunity to the children of his home village.
title: Peace Through Education: Stealing the Light
plot_es: An Afghan-American physician returns to war-torn southern Afghanistan to build a school and bring real educational opportunity to the children of his home village.
original_name: Peace Through Education: Stealing the Light
plot_en: An Afghan-American physician returns to war-torn southern Afghanistan to build a school and bring real educational opportunity to the children of his home village.
